meanings.definition: A red felt hat in the shape of a truncated cone, worn by Muslim men in the Ottoman Empire and other countries in the Middle East.
meanings.sent1: The market was filled with colorful tarbooshes.
meanings.sent2: He owned a collection of different tarbooshes.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to nap inside one of the tarbooshes.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were hidden under layers of tarbooshes.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the tarbooshes instantly transported him to the bustling bazaar.

meanings.definition: Plural form of tarboosh, a type of hat.
meanings.sent1: The shelves displayed various tarbooshes for sale.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate designs on the tarbooshes.
meanings.sent3: The tarbooshes seemed to gossip amongst themselves on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: His room was filled with memories hanging on the tarbooshes.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the wind rustling through the tarbooshes was oddly soothing.
